step: Understand that all strings in the list ls must be identical and equal to the string representation of the length of the list.

Check if the elements of the list are identical and equal to the string representation of the list length.
Adjust list length or content if the condition from step 4 is not met.
Verify that the final list meets the condition set by the function sat.
